title: Minecraft 启动器 2.1.3674-2.1.3677 发布
author: SPGoding
txt_content:
官方消息来源

Changes in Minecraft Launcher release 2.1.3674-2.1.3677:
Minecraft 启动器 2.1.3674-2.1.3677 中的改动
Keyboard navigation is now supported for the username and password fields.可以在用户名框和密码框用键盘导航The game can now be started by pressing enter on any screen where the Play button is visible.可以在任何显示有「Play」按钮的界面按下回车键启动游戏Sound cues can now be enabled for login state and results by enabling the toggle in the settings page or by pressing Ctrl+B anywhere in the launcher.可以在设置页面中设置，或者在启动器内任何界面按下 Ctrl+B 启用登录状态和结果的声音提示Kazakh is now a supported language.已支持哈萨克语

replies.txt_content:
